June 17, 2012 D Battle of the Bands
Battle of the Bands 10 Entertainments Contest Battle of the Bands battle-of-the-bands
Speedwell Rooms, Staveley Best Soloist - Emma Davis, Tenor Horn, Dronfield Entertainment and Deportment prize - Dinnigton and Dronfield (joint 1st) Bands representative award - Newhall Band Highest placed 4th section band not in the prizes - Deepcar Band
June 18, 2012, 9:55 p.m. June 18, 2012, 10:08 p.m.
